actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.

actions.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to clarify the remedial jurisdiction relating to taxes of inferior Federal courts.

summary.text: Judicial Taxation Prohibition Act of 1990 - Amends the Federal judicial code to deny to inferior Federal courts jurisdiction to issue any remedy, order, writ, or other judicial decree requiring the Federal Government or any State or local government to impose any new tax or to increase any existing tax or tax rate.

titles.title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to clarify the remedial jurisdiction relating to taxes of inferior Federal courts.
